title: Phase 1: Project scaffolding
description: Create index.html, src/ directory structure, main.js entry point. Verify: just dev serves page without errors.

title: Phase 6: Pan interaction
description:
Create input.js with mousedown/mousemove/mouseup handlers. Convert px delta to BigInt time via pxToTime. Smooth 1:1 tracking.

CRITICAL: Follow TDD and Tidy First.

title: Add help menu with hotkeys and explanation
description:
Add a help menu/modal that displays available keyboard shortcuts and explains the application's features.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Help menu accessible via '?' or 'h' key
- Lists all keyboard shortcuts with descriptions
- Explains basic navigation (pan, zoom, etc.)
- Can be dismissed with Escape or clicking outside

## Implementation Notes
- Reference existing shortcuts in src/interaction/input.js:10-14
- Current shortcuts: Home/h (jump to today), / (open search)

## Verification
1. Run `just dev`
2. Press ? key - modal appears
3. Verify all shortcuts listed
4. Press Escape - modal dismisses
5. Click outside modal - modal dismisses

## Approach
Follow TDD: write tests first, then implement.
close_reason: Implemented help menu with ? keyboard shortcut, all tests pass (149 unit + 9 E2E)

title: Phase 5: Render loop with revision checking
description: Wire up requestAnimationFrame loop in main.js. Only redraw when state.revision changes. No dispatch from render loop.

title: Add search bar to jump to specific date/time
description: Add a search bar overlay activated by '/' key. Should parse various date formats (years, Ma, Ga, named events) and jump the viewport to that time. Similar to Vim's command mode or browser address bar.
close_reason: Implemented: '/' opens search bar, parses dates (2000, 100 Ma, 4.5 Ga, Big Bang, now)

title: Phase 7: Zoom interaction

title: Phase 2: BigInt time coordinates & rational scale

title: Phase 4: Canvas renderer with culling

title: Add keyboard shortcut to jump to today and reset zoom
description: Add a keyboard shortcut (e.g., Home or 'T') to quickly navigate back to the current time and reset zoom to a reasonable default. Essential for UX when exploring deep time.
close_reason: Implemented: Home and 'h' keys jump to today with default zoom

title: Create GitHub Action for GitHub Pages deployment
description:
Create a GitHub Action workflow to automatically deploy the application to GitHub Pages on push to main branch.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Workflow triggers on push to main
- Builds the project and deploys to GitHub Pages
- Properly configures base URL for GitHub Pages

## Verification
1. Create .github/workflows/deploy.yml
2. Push to a branch and open PR
3. Check Actions tab runs successfully
4. Merge to main
5. Verify site deployed to GitHub Pages

## Approach
Test by pushing workflow and observing results. Unit tests not applicable for CI/CD workflows.

title: Phase 8: Deep-time sample data & validation
description:

CRITICAL: Follow TDD and Tidy First.
close_reason: Implemented grid lines and adaptive axis labels
